comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
In the foreground of this photo is Ryan B-1 Brougham, NC7212 (c/n 159), one of  a handful of Broughams rebuilt as "Spirit of St. Louis" replicas by Paul Mantz for the 1955 Billy Wilder directed film "The Spirit of St. Louis," starring Jimmy Stewart.  The aircraft was also flown by Charles Lindbergh.  

The aircraft is currently is on exhibit in its "Spirit of St. Louis" guise at the Cradle of Aviation Museum at Mitchel Field on Long Island.
